column2: A preference for following rather than initiating action. Dependable in executing the ideas of others. Survival mechanisms are weak.
An enjoyment of challenge and action. Frustration when no recourse for change is available. An expectation that others will also rise to challenges.
A tendency to move from one thing to another, finding it difficult to settle down. An enjoyment of change, but a lack of the stability required to see things through.
A dislike of change. An expectation that others will be reliable.
Difficulty adapting to new situations. A tendency toward inflexibility when faced with the demands of change and other people.
A tendency to procrastinate. An expectation that others will be flexible.
